      • createGameRequest

        public void createGameRequest(java.lang.String nsid,
                              java.lang.String hash,
                              int numOfPlayers,
                              int timeout,
                              java.lang.String gameType)
        A function that will create a create game request.
        Parameters:
        nsid - A valid U of S NSID.
        hash - A valid hash associated with the NSID.
        numOfPlayers - The number of player in the game selected by the user.
        timeout - The time for the timeout for one move selected by the user.
        gameType - The game type selected by the user.

      • joinGameRequest

        public void joinGameRequest(java.lang.String nsid,
                            java.lang.String hash,
                            int gameId,
                            java.lang.String token)
        A function that will create a join game request.
        Parameters:
        nsid - A valid U of S NSID.
        hash - A valid hash associated with the NSID.
        token - A secret token provided by the server to the game host.
        gameId - The gameID provided by the server to the host.
